#summary Using the genotype list service with HLA nomenclature.

=== Load HLA nomenclature ===

To load loci and alleles from the IMGT HLA nomenclature database version 2.4.0, either

{{{
$ curl -X post http://localhost:8080/gl/load-imgt-alleles
}}}

or visit

http://localhost:8080/gl

in a web browser and hit the Load IMGT alleles button.
